plot: A young boy discovers he has magical powers and attends a school for wizards.
A group of friends embark on a quest to destroy a powerful ring.
A detective investigates a series of mysterious murders in a city.
A woman falls in love with a man from a rival family.
A team of astronauts travel to Mars to save humanity.
A retired boxer trains a young athlete for the championship.
A hilarious series of events unfolds at a summer camp.
A superhero must save the world from an alien invasion.
A family moves into a haunted house.
A chef opens a restaurant in Paris and faces many challenges.
